rules_text:
Vigilance, trample
[i]King's Shadow[/i] – As long as you control a creature named Caineghis, Giffca can't be blocked and Shapeshifter Nobles you control are indestructible.
[i]Roar[/i] – {R}{G}{W}: Put a stun counter onto target tapped creature you don't control. Shapeshifters you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
